WindowGUIComponent Class Reference

This class implements a window that supports hierarchical transforms, a clipping area and has scrollable contents. More...

#include <window_gui_component.hpp>

Detailed Description

This class implements a window that supports hierarchical transforms, a clipping area and has scrollable contents.
